title: Summoners, help a poor friend...
body:
Hello Summoners,

The question I have to ask today, is on the subject of lore.
I was never much one dwindle in such things, however recent endeavours have forced me to travel down this path for the sake of authenticity.
So I ask my fellow summoners, if one was to want to get fully update with LOL lore, which would be the most efficient and methodical way to access this lore?
Is there more to learn than what is merely reflected in the in champion's past?

Thank you my friends,
Mere Intricacy  {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Well you're still calling people summoners even though that was retconned, so you're clearly not caught up.

I'd suggest using the lolwiki.

LoLwiki has all versions of champion lores available.

And some other stuff about LoL, like lores behind maps and regions etc.

Go for it.
Pretty sure there's some detailed stuff on the LoL Lore on some sites, just google it. Youtube will probably help you out aswell...
